title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 19.8 - Right to audit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 19.8 - Right to audit

State Regulations

The commissioner of finance, or his duly designated
representative, shall have the right to audit the accuracy of the payments, distributions, and remittances made to him pursuant to this agreement upon his
request, and not more frequently than once in each calendar year at a time
agreed upon by the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles and the State

Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
19.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
